item.title: Enabling hypervisor of required type in Windows 11
My favorite tech/sci channels
item.description: <p>Here is my list of my favorite channels related to science and technology<br> - <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@3blue1brown">3Blue1Brown</a> - the best channel about math I ever seen<br> - <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@pbsspacetime">PBS Space Time</a> - physics, astophysics<br> - <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@NileRed">NileRed</a> - good channel on chemistry<br> - <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@LTE4G">LTE</a> - good channel which explains principles and foundations of modern communications<br> - <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@LukeSmithxyz">Luke Smith</a> - a privacy enthusiast<br> - <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@PeriscopeFilm">PeriscopeFilm</a> - huge video archive</p>
